entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers later this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
